posts.summary: I wrote a book. It’s called “Stealing Home” and it’s about baseball, Los Angeles, manifest destiny, immigration, family, the Red...
posts.caption: I wrote a book. It’s called “Stealing Home” and it’s about baseball, Los Angeles, manifest destiny, immigration, family, the Red Scare, politics, housing, cities, mythologies, conspiracies etc. I’m proud as hell of it. Check it out!

posts.summary: "The Dude abides. I don’t know about you but I take comfort in that. It’s good knowin’ he’s out there. The Dude. Takin’ ‘er easy...
posts.caption:
leeleeleelee:

fuckyeahbiglebowski:

“The Dude abides. I don’t know about you but I take comfort in that. It’s good knowin’ he’s out there. The Dude. Takin’ ‘er easy for all us sinners. Shoosh. I sure hope he makes the finals.”

I don’t know about the rules about reblogging your side blogs, but I am having a very Dude morning right now and this gif/quote sums it up nicely.

posts.summary:
Here goes nothing…  Spikes High Sporting and Goods at spikeshigh.co is now open!
 What is Spikes High?  Spikes High Sporting...
posts.caption:
trying to figure out what is this magical internet place…:

spikeshigh:

Here goes nothing…
Spikes High Sporting and Goods at spikeshigh.co is now open!

What is Spikes High?
Spikes High Sporting and Goods is a marketplace of contemporary design goods, art, curated vintage finds, and overall “cool shit” for the sport-obsessed.

posts.summary: Shown here is the micro forge test at GE’s Global Research Center. Researchers use the rig to heat up and apply 100,000 lbs. of...
posts.caption:
generalelectric:

Shown here is the micro forge test at GE’s Global Research Center. Researchers use the rig to heat up and apply 100,000 lbs. of pressure to different advanced materials to find out how to make them even stronger. While everyday objects crumble, GE materials are designed to take the pressure. Head over to our YouTube channel to see more everyday objects being smashed, crushed and blasted.
